page.title: 12MONGEHAM AND RIPPLE W.I.
page.content: This W.I. has a membership of twenty-seven, most of whom are over seventy. This year they have been on an outing to a craft fair and flower festival, which was not enjoyed by most members because of too many stairs. They held the Institute's Fortieth Birthday Party, and a coffee morning and a Jumble Sale to raise funds. They have also held a flower show and ploughman's lunches. They have shown the film, 'Green and Pleasant Land' to members. The title comes from a line of the song 'Jerusalem' which the Women's Institute Movement has adopted as its Anthem.
